name: omentor_app
description: OMentor is a next-generation online coaching platform built using Flutter, designed to guide students toward successful careers through personalized mentorship, skill development, and structured training programs.  The omentor_app offers a seamless, cross-platform experience for learners — combining intuitive design, powerful features, and scalable architecture to support short-term and long-term coaching goals. Whether it’s preparing for placements, mastering in-demand tech skills, or receiving interview-ready guidance, OMentor bridges the gap between learning and real-world success.
